#Please setup the Task Variables!
# Don't change code below unless you know what you are doing from org.ow2.proactive.addons.webhook import Webhook
jobid = variables.get("PA_JOB_ID") schedulerURL = variables.get("PA_SCHEDULER_REST_URL")
print schedulerURL # get sessionid schedulerapi.connect() sessionid = schedulerapi.getSession()
# pause job schedulerapi.pauseJob(jobid)
# send web validation print "Sending email validation..." url = schedulerURL.replace("/rest", "") +'/notification-service/notifications' headers = '{\"Content-Type\" : \"application/json\"}' notification_content = '{\"description\": \"'+variables.get("notification_message")+'\", \"jobId\": \"'+jobid+'\" , \"validation\": \"true\", \"emailValidation\": \"'+variables.get("email_to")+'\" , \"userValidation\": \"'+variables.get("user_to_login")+'\", \"notificationServiceUrl\": \"'+url+'\", \"userName\" : \"'+variables.get("PA_USER")+'\", \"sessionId\": \"'+sessionid+'\" }' Webhook.execute ( 'POST', url, headers, notification_content); print "Email Validation sent"
